text: Hla Myint ( ) is a Burmese politician, ambassador, and former mayor of Yangon. He was also a brigadier general in the Myanmar Army, and has served as a diplomat. Myint studied at the Defense Services Academy from 1967 to 1971. He retired as brigadier general in 2002. After military service, he had served as ambassador to Argentina and Brazil from 2002 to 2005, and to Japan from 2005 to 2010. ==References== Category:Burmese diplomats Category:Burmese military personnel Category:Mayors of Yangon Category:Ambassadors of Myanmar to Argentina Category:Ambassadors of Myanmar to Brazil Category:Ambassadors of Myanmar to Japan Category:1940s births Category:Living people Category:Defence Services Academy alumni
title: Hla Myint (brigadier general)
